Detailed Description

Provides various palette modification methods.

FIBITMAP *  dst 
)

Copies the palette from one FIBITMAP to another.

Parameters:

dst Image to copy palette to.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.
